definition: servile
low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
surname San
three/3
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
four/4

sentences.english: I want to get back with her. But I'm not going to grovel.
sentences.chinese: 我想和她重温旧情，但我不会低三下四求她的。

sentences.english: There was a lot of sleaze going on at that night club.
sentences.chinese: 那夜总会的表演有很多是低三下四的。

sentences.english: All that bowing and scraping did not impress him.
sentences.chinese: 所有那些低三下四的话并没有打动他。

sentences.english: He is almost abject in his respect for his boss.
sentences.chinese: 他对老板的尊敬几乎是低三下四。

definition: to bow and bend the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
to accept a compromise
servile and bending the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
to pester someone again and again
to look displeased/to not be afraid of hurting sb's feelings/to put aside one's pride
to be conciliatory or apologetic/to tread warily in dealing with sb
brazen faced (idiom); shameless
to bow down to everything sb says or does/to act submissively in order to ingratiate oneself
to get off one's high horse (idiom)/to dispense with posturing (and adopt a more humble or empathetic attitude)
to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it
kind words/sweet talk/coaxing manner
to get the desired outcome/to win favor by fawning on sb/to curry favor with/a fruitful outcome to reward one's labor
to put on airs/to be ostentatious
bowed head and ears glued (idiom); docile and obedient/at sb's beck and call
shameless/brazen
lowly/humble
